snippet: Ebola is sweeping into areas of West Africa that had been largely spared the onslaught. The consequences in one Sierra Leone hospital have been devastating.
abstract: Ebola virus is sweeping into areas of West Africa that had been largely spared the onslaught and are not in the least prepared for it; Sierra Leone's Bombali district went from one confirmed case to more than 190 in less than two months, with dozens more suspected.
lead_paragraph: Ebola is sweeping into areas of West Africa that had been largely spared the onslaught. The consequences in one Sierra Leone hospital have been devastating.

headline.main: A Hospital From Hell, in a City Swamped by Ebola
headline.print_headline: Outracing Vows of Aid, Ebola Swamps a City Unprepared for It
